description:
A young boy who lives near Koji and sometimes plays with him. He`s very close to his mom after his father died and his very protective of her.
[spoiler=""]It turns out that he is actually the creature that has killed several people. The reason why is that he was traumatized from watching his mother have sex and that resulted in him viewing it as a dangerous activity which hurt her. It didn`t help that she`s interested in BDSM which further destabilized his perception.  [/spoiler]
name: Yuuta Tamachi
